name: HackYou (Krolik)
description:
Hack You is a 2D, multiplayer, hacking simulation game, the main objective is to hack into other player's "computers" and virtual institutions to gain intel and make some money and climb the ranks of the "black hat" world.

Currently the game is in open beta  which means that once the game officially released all accounts will be reset however every account will be awarded in game prizes.

Register in the Forums (Community) and join the conversation.
